example.text: 97 days ago, I met with President Biden to discuss how he can avoid defaulting on our national debt. For 97 days, he has ignored the crisis. House Republicans are the only ones in Washington who have passed a responsible debt limit increase that avoids default. Today is a new… [[url]]

Our national debt crisis is too important to play politics. That’s why House Republicans voted to avoid default and responsibly raise the debt limit. Our founders designed our government for negotiation. So let’s get this done. [[url]]

97 days ago, I met with President Biden to discuss how he can avoid defaulting on our national debt. For 97 days, he has ignored the crisis. House Republicans are the only ones in Washington who have passed a responsible debt limit increase that avoids default. Today is a new… [[url]]
President Biden has only been to the border one time in 50 years. Maybe if he visited more often he would understand the chaos he has created.

- 4:00 p.m. HR 7946 ( - Veteran Service Recognition Act of 2022 (Structured Rule) (Sponsored by Rep. Mark Takano / Judiciary Committee) The Rule provides for one hour of general debate and makes in order the following amendment: Rep. Vicente Gonzalez Amendment Postponed Suspension Votes: 1) House Amendment ( to S 198 - Data Mapping to Save Moms' Lives Act (Sponsored by Sen. Jacky Rosen / Energy and Commerce Committee) 2) Senate Amendment ( to HR 3462 - SBA Cyber Awareness Act (Sponsored by Rep. Jason Crow / Small Business Committee) 3) HR 8844 ( - STEP Improvement Act of 2022 (Sponsored by Rep. Dwight Evans / Small Business Committee) 4) House Amendment ( to S 1687 - Small Business Cyber Training Act of 2022 (Sponsored by Sen. Marco Rubio / Small Business Committee) 5) S 1617 ( - Disaster Assistance for Rural Communities Act (Sponsored by Sen. James Risch / Small Business Committee) 6) S 3875 ( - Community Disaster Resilience Zones Act of 2022 (Sponsored by Sen. Gary Peters / Transportation and Infrastructure Committee) 7) S 3499 ( - To amend the Post-Katrina Emergency Management Reform Act of 2006 to repeal certain obsolete requirements (Sponsored by Sen. Gary Peters / Transportation and Infrastructure Committee) 8) S 2796 ( - Rural Opioid Abuse Prevention Act (Sponsored by Sen. Jon Ossoff / Judiciary Committee) 9) S 4834 ( - PROTECT Our Children Act of 2022 (Sponsored by Sen. John Cornyn / Judiciary Committee) 10) Senate Amendment ( to HR 5796 - Patents for Humanity Act of 2022 (Sponsored by Rep. Hakeem Jeffries / Judiciary Committee) 11) S 4052 ( - Early Hearing Detection and Intervention Act (Sponsored by Sen. This event in the US Capitol is canceled. Instead, I will host a bipartisan discussion to honor the 75th anniversary of the US-Israel relationship. [[url]]
